value.message: Function name 'load' is vague and does not use a verb or verb-noun combination.
value.suggestion: Rename 'load' to 'fetchOrders' or 'loadOrders' to clearly indicate its action.

value.message: ordersApi.getAll() fetches all orders without verifying resource ownership; possible IDOR risk if backend does not enforce user-specific filtering.
value.suggestion: Ensure ordersApi.getAll() only returns orders belonging to the current authenticated user at the backend. Add authorization checks server-side.
